ComicInfo.Title: Great Moments in the History of Cocaine; Night of the Nearly Dead; Iceworld; Coke Ettiquette; Sucked In!!; Posterior Plus; The Game; Sunday Morning Last-Line Blues; Puss n' Toots; The Spawn of Cokethulhu; The Nose Circus
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-19 15:24:24. [CVDB77704] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 17:09:42. [Issue ID 97415]
ComicInfo.Characters: Trashman,Count Nostrilachoo,Larry Jewish,Mr. Potato Head,Phoebe,Nekko,Dr. Mandingo,Wildroot,Rosie The Riveter,Frosty The Snowman,The Great Nasalio,Fat Freddy's Cat,Dr. Atomic,God Nose,Space Dog,Valentino,Professor Brownfinger
ComicInfo.Summary:
Great Moments in the History of Cocaine: The construction of an artifact.
Night of the Nearly Dead: The Count has a plan to monopolize his guest's coke.
Iceworld: Space Dog is given some adulterated cocaine.
Coke Ettiquette: Neil arrives with some primo toot.
Sucked In!!: Students make their coke go further by shrinking themselves.
Posterior Plus: An explanation of the workings of the posterior.
The Game: A card game in the bar.
Sunday Morning Last-Line Blues: Cousin Zeke comes to visit.
Puss n' Toots: The cat gets the toot.
The Spawn of Cokethulhu: Some coke travels through time with strange consequences.
The Nose Circus: The Great Nasalio takes a dive.
